data.title: Cruise Lines, Ships and Addresses
data.meta_description: Cruise information and brochures are available from travel agents and the cruise lines.
data.text:
Cruise information and brochures are available from travel agents and the cruise lines. For your convenience, here’s a listing of the cruise lines:

Admiral Cruise Line (a merger of Eastern Cruise Lines, Western Cruise Lines and Sundance Cruises), 1220 Biscayne Blvd., Miami 33132, phone (305) 374-1611. Ships: Emerald Seas, Azure Seas, Stardancer.

American Canadian Line, P.O. Box 368, Warren, R.I. 02885, phone (800) 556-7450. Ships: Caribbean Prince, New Shoreham II.

American Cruise Lines, 1 Marine Park, Haddam, Conn. 06438, phone (800) 243-6755. Ships: America, New Orleans, Savannah.

American Hawaii Cruises, 550 Kearny St., San Francisco 94108, phone (800) 227-3666. Ships: Constitution, Independence, Liberte.

American President Lines, 1800 Harrison St., Oakland, Calif. 94612, phone (415) 272-8148. Ships: Cleveland, Jackson, Taylor, Wilson, Taft, McKinley, Van Buren.

Bermuda Star Line, 1086 Teaneck Road, Teaneck, N.J. 07666, phone (800) 237-5361. Ships: Bermuda Star, Veracruz.

Carnival Cruise Lines, 5225 N.W. 87th Ave., Miami 33166, phone (800) 327-9501. Ships: Carnivale, Festivale, Holiday, Jubilee, Mardi Gras, Tropicale.

Chandris Fantasy Cruises, 900 3rd Ave., New York 10022, phone (800) 223-0848. Ships: Amerikanis, Britanis, Galileo, Romanza, Victoria.

Clipper Cruise Line, 7711 Bonhomme Ave., St. Louis, Mo. 63105, phone (800) 325-0010. Ships: Nantucket Clipper, Newport Clipper.

Commodore Cruise Line, 1007 North America Way, Miami 33132, phone (800) 327-5617. Ships: Boheme, Caribe I.

Costa Cruises, 1 Biscayne Tower, Miami 33131, phone (800) 462-6782. Ships: Carla Costa, CostaRiviera, Eugenio Costa, Danae, Daphne.

Crown Cruise Line, P.O. Box 3000, Boca Raton, Fla. 33431, phone (800) 841-7447. Ship: Viking Princess.

Cunard Line, Cunard/NAC, Cunard/Sea Goddess Cruises, 555 Fifth Ave., New York 10017, phone (800) 221-4770. Ships: Cunard Countess, Cunard Princess, Queen Elizabeth 2, Sagafjord, Sea Goddess I, Sea Goddess II, Vistafjord.

Delta Queen Steamboat Co., 30 Robin Street Wharf, New Orleans, La. 70130, phone (800) 458-6789. Ships: Delta Queen, Mississippi Queen.

Dirigo Cruises, 39 Waterside Lane, Clinton, Conn. 06413, phone (203) 669-7068. Ships: Rachel & Ebenezer, Harvey Gamage.

Dolphin Cruises, 1007 North America Way, Miami 33132, phone (800) 222-1003. Ship: Dolphin IV.

Eastern Cruise Lines (see Admiral).

Epirotiki Lines, 551 Fifth Ave., New York 10176, phone (212) 599-1750. Ships: Jason, World Renaissance.

Exploration Cruise Lines, 1500 Metropolitan Park Building, Olive Way and Boren Avenue, Seattle 98101, phone (800) 426-0600. Ships: Colonial Explorer, Executive Explorer, Explorer Starship, Great Rivers Explorer, Majestic Explorer, North Star.

Fantasy Cruises, 4770 Biscayne Blvd., Miami 33137, phone (800) 423-2100. Ships: Amerikanis, Victoria, Britannis, Galileo.

Hellenic Mediterranean Lines, 1 Hallidie Plaza, Suite 405, San Francisco 94102, (415) 989-7434. Ship: Aquarius.

Holland America Line/Westours, 300 Elliott Ave. W., Seattle 98119, phone (800) 426-0327. Ships: Nieuw Amsterdam, Noordam, Rotterdam.

Home Lines Cruises, 1 World Trade Center, Suite 3969, New York 10048, phone (800) 221-4041. Ships: Atlantic, Homeric.

“K” Lines-Hellenic Cruises, Olympic Tower, 645 Fifth Ave., New York 10022, phone (800) 223-7880. Ships: Constellation, Galaxy, Orion.

Lindblad Travel Inc., 1 Sylvan Road North, Westport, Conn. 06881, phone (800) 243-5657. Leases various ships.

Lykes Lines, Lykes Center, 300 Poydras St., New Orleans 70130, phone (504) 523-6611. Ships: 23 freighters.

Maxim’s des Mers, 50 N. La Cienega Blvd., Suite 203, Beverly Hills 90211, phone (213) 855-1844. Ship: Maxim’s des Mers.

Norwegian Caribbean Lines, 1 Biscayne Tower, Suite 3000, Miami 33131, phone (800) 327-7030. Ships: Norway, Skyward, Southward, Starward, Sunward II.

Ocean Cruise Lines, Ocean Cruise Lines Building, 1510 S.E. 17th St., Fort Lauderdale, Fla. 33316, phone (305) 764-5566. Ships: Ocean Islander, Ocean Princess.

Fred Olsen Line, Sea Air Holidays, 733 Summer St., Stamford, Conn. 06901, phone (203) 356-9033.

Paquet French Cruises (See Sun Line Cruises).

Pearl Cruises, 1700 Montgomery St., Suite 320, San Francisco 94111, phone (800) 338-1700. Ship: Pearl of Scandinavia.

Premier Cruise Lines, 101 George King Blvd., Cape Canaveral, Fla. 32920, phone (800) 327-7114. Ships: Starship Oceanic, Starship Royale.

Princess Cruises, 2029 Century Park East, Los Angeles 90067, phone (213) 553-7000. Ships: Island Princess, Pacific Princess, Royal Princess, Sea Princess, Sun Princess.

Regency Cruises, 260 Madison Ave., New York 10016, phone (212) 972-4774. Ship: Regent Sea.

Royal Caribbean Cruise Line, 903 South America Way, Miami 33132, phone (800) 327-6700. Ships: Nordic Prince, Song of America, Song of Norway, Sun Viking.

Royal Cruise Line, 1 Maritime Plaza, Suite 660, San Francisco 94111, phone (800) 792-2992. Ships: Golden Odyssey, Royal Odyssey.

Royal Viking Line, 1 Embarcadero Center, San Francisco 94111, phone (800) 422-8000. Ships: Royal Viking Sea, Royal Viking Sky, Royal Viking Star. Effective Oct. 1, new address: 750 Battery St., San Francisco 94111.

Salen Lindblad Cruising, 133 East 55th St., New York 10022, phone (800) 223-5688. Ships: Ambassador, Island Explorer, Funchal.

Scandinavian World Cruises, 1080 Port Blvd., Port of Miami, Miami 33132, phone (800) 327-7400. Ships: Scandinavian Sun, Scandinavian Star, Scandinavian Sky.

Sea Goddess Cruises, 5805 Blue Lagoon Drive, Miami 33126, phone (800) 458-9000. Ships: Sea Goddess I, Sea Goddess II. (Cunard Line has assumed operation of the line, which will continue in Florida for time being.)

Sitmar Cruises, 10100 Santa Monica Blvd., Los Angeles 90067, phone (213) 553-1666. Ships: Fairsea, Fairsky, Fairwind.

Society Expeditions Cruises, 300 Elliott Ave. W., Suite 400, Seattle 98119, phone (800) 426-7794. Ships: World Discoverer, Society Explorer. (After Oct. 1: 3131 Elliott Ave. W., Suite 700, Seattle 98121.)

Sundance Cruises (see Admiral).

Sun Line Cruises, 1 Rockefeller Center, Suite 315, New York 10020, phone (800) 872-6400. Ships: Stella Maris, Stella Oceanis, Stella Solaris. (Sun Line Cruises is also agent for Paquet French Cruises. Ship: Mermoz.)

Swans Hellenic Cruises, Exprinter Tour Operators, 500 Fifth Ave., New York 10110, phone (212) 719-1200. Ships: Orpheus, Danube, Berlin.

Travel Dynamics, 132 East 70th St., New York 10021, phone (800) 367-6766. Ships: Illiria, Sea Cloud.

Venice Simplon-Orient Express, 1 World Trade Center, Suite 1235, New York 10048, phone (800) 524-2420. Ship: Orient-Express.

Western Cruise Lines (see Admiral).

Windstar Sail Cruises, 7415 Northwest 19th St., Miami 33126, phone (800) 258-7245. Ships: Wind Star, Wind Song.
